DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether inhaled corticosteroid (specially nebulized) could be a good alternative to oral corticosteroid and whether they are effective in the treatment of sinusitis
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Inhaled Treatment in Sinusitis
DOC.criteria: Nasal/Sinus polyps Previous sinus surgery Age under 18y Use of antibiotics
